name: General's Game
description:
- Play a strategy board game,
- Move your officers to enemy grid and gather information.
- The higher officer rank wins.
- Capturing enemy flag bearer wins the game
- Play with more game scenarios
- Arrange pieces on board games
- Play with your friends on network game

Rules:
- Only one grid per move allowed.
- The higher rank piece win. All officers from Captain and above can be defeated by a Spy.
- A Spy can be defeated only by a Private Officer.
- To move, select piece and tap adjacent grid.
- To attact, select your piece and place over to the enemy location.
- To win, capture enemy flag or kill all enemy officers.
